column5: 360 square foot master suite located near all highways. Very private location that has a gorgeous view from 100 square feet of windows so you can view to sunset or the stars at night from bed. Amenities include an extra tall queen air mattress, additional air mattress, movie projector, wifi, rain shower. Pillows, sheets, towels, soap, shampoo, closet with hangers, and hair dryer included. Continental breakfast, bottled water, coffee provided in the morning. Popcorn available on request.
column8: Luxury Country Club Penthouse Suite in Columbus
